name: Orange Puzzle
description:
Orange Puzzle is an Android and Windows application I'm working on as a didactic project. The application has arrived at a point wich is very fun to play, so I've decided to share it here.

The application let you choose an image from your library and present you with a set of options to transform the image into a jigsaw puzzle.

The main goal is to have fun rebuilding the original image, but there are also additional features like time tracking and a sharing system (on development) to show your friends how awesome you are.

All your results are registered and you can review them in the main gallery page.

Requirements for Android:

At least 2 GB of RAM (bigger the images you process and more RAM you'll need).

I suggest you don't go over 4000x4000 pixels.
